dashboard.label: Searches
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_RuHXk4Nu":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_t11vTqdf"},"title":"Searches by Index","description":"In number of days","eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.setToken","options":{"tokens":[{"token":"rowvalue","key":"row.explict_index.value"}]}}],"showProgressBar":false,"showLastUpdated":false,"options":{"stackMode":"stacked"}},"viz_KMVI5FLt":{"type":"splunk.column","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_QTjQ8ncg_ds_t11vTqdf"},"title":"Searches by Index","options":{"stackMode":"stacked"},"description":"In number of days"},"viz_cE2A2P74":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_jO0RyFkz"},"title":"Top Searchers in $rowvalue$","options":{"count":5}},"viz_RBAyOTTK":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"* **Total Searches Ran -** The total number of searches the user ran over the selected time period 
* **Total Search Time -** The Total amount of time all searches a user initiated took over the selected time period 
* **Average Run Time -** The Average runtime of all the searches ran over the selected time period 
* **Average Lookback -** The amount of time search searche was set back listed in days. I.E.7 days average lookback means the average time parameter set for a search was 7 days
* **Max Lookback -** The maximum value a user selected to search back to 
* **Median lookback -** The median value a user selected to search back to. 
* **Perc90 lookback -** The 90th percentile value a user selected to search back to. "}},"viz_SBHIvx3a":{"type":"splunk.rectangle"},"viz_itkvRdPE":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"# User Behavior in "$rowvalue$" index. "}},"viz_1f1nPbSk":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"**Cache -** Useful to look at median and average lookbacks when considering cache for DDAS. "}}},"dataSources":{"ds_t11vTqdf":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="_audit" OR field=TERM(info=completed) NOT typeahead | rex "search_id='(?<search_id>.*?)'" | eval search_et=if(search_et="N/A",0,search_et) | rex "', search='(?<thesearch>.*)"| rex max_match=100 field=thesearch "index(?:\s=\s|=\s|\s=|=)(?<explict_index>.*?)(?:\s|$|\)|\'|\,)" | eval lookback=_time-search_et | fields search_id lookback explict_index
| eval explict_index=replace(explict_index,"\"","")
| eval lookback=round(lookback/60/60/24,0)
$all_time_removal$
| stats dc(search_id) AS numOfSearches max(lookback) as oldest_event_searched_Days avg(lookback) as Average_Lookback_Days median(lookback) as Median_Lookback_Days by explict_index
| sort - numOfSearches
$remove_internal$"},"name":"Searches by Index"},"ds_QTjQ8ncg_ds_t11vTqdf":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="_audit" OR field=TERM(info=completed) NOT typeahead | rex "search_id='(?<search_id>.*?)'" | eval search_et=if(search_et="N/A",0,search_et) | rex "', search='(?<thesearch>.*)"| rex max_match=100 field=thesearch "index(?:\s=\s|=\s|\s=|=)(?<explict_index>.*?)(?:\s|$|\)|\'|\,)" | eval lookback=_time-search_et | fields search_id lookback explict_index
| search explict_index=$rowvalue$
| eval lookback=round(lookback/60/60/24,0)
$all_time_removal$
| stats dc(search_id) AS numOfSearches max(lookback) as oldest_event_searched_Days avg(lookback) as Average_Lookback_Days median(lookback) as Median_Lookback_Days by explict_index
| sort - numOfSearches"},"name":"Searches by Index copy 1"},"ds_XMgJlprB":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="_audit" OR field=TERM(info=completed) NOT typeahead | rex "search_id='(?<search_id>.*?)'" | eval search_et=if(search_et="N/A",0,search_et) | rex "', search='(?<thesearch>.*)"| rex max_match=100 field=thesearch "index(?:\s=\s|=\s|\s=|=)(?<explict_index>.*?)(?:\s|$|\)|\'|\,)" | eval lookback=_time-search_et | fields search_id lookback explict_index
| search explict_index=$rowvalue$
| eval lookback=round(lookback/60/60/24,0)"},"name":"MASTER - DiggingIn"},"ds_jO0RyFkz":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_XMgJlprB","query":"| kv pairdelim="," kvdelim="="
| stats count sum(total_run_time) as sum_total_run_time avg(total_run_time) as avg_total_run_time avg(lookback) as avg_lookback_days max(lookback) as max_lookback_days median(lookback) as med_lookback_days perc90(lookback) as perc90_lookback_days by user

| eval avg_lookback_days=round(avg_lookback_days,2)
| eval avg_lookback_days=round(avg_lookback_days,2)
| eval med_lookback_days=round(med_lookback_days,2)
| eval perc90_lookback_days=round(perc90_lookback_days,2)

| eval sum_total_run_time=round(sum_total_run_time,2)
| eval avg_total_run_time=round(avg_total_run_time,2)
| rename sum_total_run_time as "Total Search Time (seconds)" 
| rename avg_total_run_time as "Average Run Time (seconds)"
| rename count as "Total Searches Ran""},"name":"Top User"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_QTyt5qTl":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"Enable","value":"| where lookback<1800"},{"label":"Disable","value":"| where lookback>1"}],"token":"all_time_removal","defaultValue":"| where lookback<1800"},"title":"Remove All Time","type":"input.dropdown"},"input_Xr24pqoe":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"Enable","value":"| search explict_index!=_*"},{"label":"Disable","value":"| search explict_index=*"}],"token":"remove_internal","defaultValue":"| search explict_index!=_*"},"title":"Remove Internal Indexes","type":"input.dropdown"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":5000,"width":1500},"structure":[{"item":"viz_SBHIvx3a","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":390,"w":1490,"h":540}},{"item":"viz_RuHXk4Nu","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":1480,"h":370}},{"item":"viz_KMVI5FLt","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":1130,"w":1180,"h":370}},{"item":"viz_cE2A2P74","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":610,"w":1470,"h":310}},{"item":"viz_RBAyOTTK","type":"block","position":{"x":770,"y":380,"w":720,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_itkvRdPE","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":400,"w":530,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_1f1nPbSk","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":470,"w":680,"h":120}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_QTyt5qTl","input_Xr24pqoe"]},"description":"","title":"Searches"}
